abstract_summ: Although intubation improved SPO(2), reduced PaCO(2) and blood lactate, seven of 20 patients died within 7-days after tracheal intubation.The PPE with positive pressure protective hood should be needed to perform bronchoscope-guided endotracheal intubation in patients with COVID-19, it could strengthen to protect healthcare workers from virus exposure.The 9 healthcare workers who involved in intubation received virus nucleic acid test and 14 days temperature monitoring.We have retrospectively reviewed medical charts of 20 critically ill patients with Covid-19 pneumonia who required tracheal intubation from February 17 to March 19 in Wuhan No.1 hospital, China.We conducted a retrospective study in 12 cases with COVID-19 who underwent endotracheal intubation at ICU of the Guangzhou eighth hospital from January 20 to February 10, 2020.
title_summ: Extubation and the Risks of Coughing and Laryngospasm in the Era of Coronavirus Disease-19 (COVID-19)Summary of 20 tracheal intubation by anesthesiologists for patients with severe COVID-19 pneumonia: retrospective case series[Analysis of bronchoscope-guided tracheal intubation in 12 cases with COVID-19 under the personal protective equipment with positive pressure protective hood].
title_abstract_phrases: ELECTRONIC SUPPLEMENTARY MATERIAL: The online version of this article (10.1007/s00540-020-02778-8) contains supplementary material, which is available to authorized users.[Analysis of bronchoscope-guided tracheal intubation in 12 cases with COVID-19 under the personal protective equipment with positive pressure protective hood].Endotracheal intubation is an independent risk factor for respiratory infectious diseases.Summary of 20 tracheal intubation by anesthesiologists for patients with severe COVID-19 pneumonia: retrospective case seriesSARS-CoV-2 pandemic is announced and it is very important to share our experience to the critical care community in the early stage.Although intubation improved SPO(2), reduced PaCO(2) and blood lactate, seven of 20 patients died within 7-days after tracheal intubation.The PPE with positive pressure protective hood should be needed to perform bronchoscope-guided endotracheal intubation in patients with COVID-19, it could strengthen to protect healthcare workers from virus exposure.We have retrospectively reviewed medical charts of 20 critically ill patients with Covid-19 pneumonia who required tracheal intubation from February 17 to March 19 in Wuhan No.1 hospital, China.
